mapper.sql: id, username, password, passwordsalt, realname, mobile, groupid, groupname, disable, createdate, parentid, roles
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from admin
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into admin
id,
username,
password,
passwordsalt,
realname,
mobile,
groupid,
groupname,
disable,
createdate,
parentid,
roles,

mapper.update:
update admin
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
username = #{record.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
passwordsalt = #{record.passwordsalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
realname = #{record.realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{record.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
groupid = #{record.groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
groupname = #{record.groupname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
disable = #{record.disable,jdbcType=BIT},
createdate = #{record.createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
parentid = #{record.parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
roles = #{record.roles,typeHandler=project.jinshang.typeHandler.ArrayTypeHandler},

update admin set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, username = #{record.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passwordsalt = #{record.passwordsalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realname = #{record.realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{record.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, groupid = #{record.groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, groupname = #{record.groupname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, disable = #{record.disable,jdbcType=BIT}, createdate = #{record.createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, parentid = #{record.parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, roles = #{record.roles,typeHandler=project.jinshang.typeHandler.ArrayTypeHandler}

update admin
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
passwordsalt = #{passwordsalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
groupid = #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
groupname = #{groupname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
disable = #{disable,jdbcType=BIT},
createdate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
roles = #{roles,typeHandler=project.jinshang.typeHandler.ArrayTypeHandler},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update admin set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passwordsalt = #{passwordsalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, groupid = #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, groupname = #{groupname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, disable = #{disable,jdbcType=BIT}, createdate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, roles = #{roles,typeHandler=project.jinshang.typeHandler.ArrayTypeHandler} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
